events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and are reviewing the submitted resume and cover letter carefully to ensure fit.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords including software, engineer, and developer found in the candidate's profile.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to handle the candidate's application and coordinate subsequent recruitment steps.
The candidate was contacted for initial screening to assess technical skills and overall suitability for the software engineering role.
The candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the position and availability for further interview rounds.
Technical interview has been scheduled for the candidate to evaluate coding skills, problem-solving abilities, and engineering knowledge.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong expertise in software development and problem solving.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and company policies with the candidate.
The candidate completed the HR interview showing alignment with company values and interest in the offered role.
We have extended a job offer to the candidate detailing the role, compensation, and onboarding process to welcome them aboard.
The candidate provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed excitement to join the engineering team.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer and confirmed the start date for their new software engineering position.
Onboarding procedures have commenced, including system access setup, team introductions, and orientation scheduled for the new hire.
The hiring process has been successfully completed; the candidate is now fully integrated into the engineering team.
